profile_positions.description: Tara is an Academy for breathwork, meditation and tantra. We give workshops and retreats to unveil the full potency in your life & relationships.
profile_positions.title: Founder

profile_positions.description:
// HELLO
I coach teams and individual on the fields of Growth hacking + Lean startup + Mindfulness. This creates a healthy, vibrant culture with excellent results.

// MY EXPERIENCE
Over the last 5 years I worked in leading growth roles of tech startups like Peerby, Vigga and Superbuddy (AH Rappie) and I saw it over and over again: a team thrives when there is a clear strategy, effective growth processes and a healthy culture. Based on my experience as a growth consultant for over 30 companies and the workshops I give in personal development and human connection I created a team coaching process focussed on maximum results and employees that are shining with happiness. 

// FOR WHO?
I work with teams and individuals that embrace a lean approach and want to find bright shiny fulfilment in their work.
- Founders & CEO's
- Startup & Scale up teams (growth teams mostly)
- Corporate innovation teams

// HOW DO I ACHIEVE RESULTS:
I coach teams on three dimensions:
- Culture & Purpose: I facilitate Team Culture and individual Purpose Sessions. This creates a feeling of trust and inspiration.
- Growth strategy: I help you to clarify the One Metric That Matters in your business. And craft the most effective growth strategy to reach your objectives.
- Execution: I implement rapid Build-Measure-Learn loops in your team and I facilitate design, growth and validation sprints incl the setup of data tracking and metric tools.

// HAVE YOU UNLOCKED YOUR POTENTIAL?
I am really curious to hear how companies find the balance between results and happiness. I am looking for CEOs, Founders, HR and Innovation managers to talk to. 
Do you know somebody in this field? Please hook me up.

Thanks for now!
Sjors 
 
www.thegrowthcoach.nl
profile_positions.title: The Growth Coach - Growth, Lean and Culture coaching for growth teams and marketeers.

We are currently accepting new clients. Are you ready for some serious growth? Do the free online Growth Quickscan  and check if you can apply. 

Lean Product Development - Growth Hacking - Online Marketing - Technical Implementation - Marketing Automation

profile_positions.title: Growth hacker & Lean startup Coach - Mantelzorg (Rabobank)

profile_positions.description:
PROJECT
Superbuddy is an on demand grocery delivery platform like Instacart. Together with AHOLD DELHAIZE we launched RAPPIE: a grocery delivery service which gets your fresh groceries on your doorstep within 2 hours by delivery bike.  (https://www.ah.nl/rappie)

RESULT
In 8 weeks we delivered a proof of concept in Rotterdam. In the following months we generated sufficient traction for an Ahold / Superbuddy board approval for a nationwide rollout. . 

MY ROLE
I got onboard as interim Head of Growth to lead the Ahold/Superbuddy growth squad (10 - 25 pp). This role extended towards a strategic advisor role during the commercial negotiations with Ahold and other retailers. I drafted a growth model and held a central position in the preparations of the negotiations.
profile_positions.title: Head of Growth (interim)

profile_positions.description:
Tomto is a service which gives corporate employees insight in how they can keep growing in their career. Tomto puts employees back in the driver seat of their careers and help them improve and enjoy their daily work experience.
As a growth hacker I ran a series of validation experiments, defined high value customer pockets and set up a growth strategy.
profile_positions.title: Growth Hacker - Tomto (Randstad)

profile_positions.description:
THE COMPANY
VIGGA is an award-winning business model for the apparel industry;
a maternity and kids brand, designed for a circular economy.

The VIGGA™ product-service-system enables parents to subscribe to the use of high-quality organic maternity and kids wear on a continues basis, addressing a universal fact: pregnancy bellies and kids grow, and clothes don’t. 

MY ROLE
As interim Head of Growth I was responsible for assessing the growth potential and draft a strategy for international scaling. With the results of the experiments and the growth strategy as a basis Vigga is currently  raising funds.

IMPACT
To date, VIGGA has circulated over 100,000 pieces of designers clothing; our customers have together achieved water savings of 7,5 million litres and reduced their CO2 emissions by 7 tonnes by sharing VIGGA clothes with each other.

Re-use beats re-cycling by far… 
Our LCA studies show great benefits compared to traditional consumption:
- 53% less climate impact 
- 59% less acidification effect 
- 72% lower use of material resources 
- 90% lower water use


www.vigga.us
profile_positions.title: Head of Growth (interim)

profile_positions.description:
Peerby is a platform which enables neighbours to borrow and rent stuff from each other. With over 250,000 signups in the Netherlands, Belgium, and twenty more European and American cities, Peerby is the world’s leading platform for sharing things. According to Wired, we are one of the “hottest startups in Europe”, and we are in 34th position on the global list of exponential of exponential organisations.

I was responsible for the national and international scaling of of Peerby GO, the peer to peer rental version of Peerby.
profile_positions.title: Growth lead

profile_positions.description:
POP Fruits is a Swedish / Dutch food startup. We bring you fresh frozen fruits on a stick. 100% natural. No additives what so ever. The only thing we've added is the stick.

Our Swedish friends launched POP Fruits in Stockholm in 2014 and are available in +100 points of sale in Sweden. After this success we took the product to The Netherlands. One summer underway we are now available in 20 points of sale.

In 2016, POP Fruits has been acquired by the UK good food brand Okobay, making the future of frozen mangos on a stick brighter and brighter. 


www.popfruits.nl
profile_positions.title: Founder POP Fruits NL

profile_positions.description:
Socrates is a platform for dreamers and adventurists. We organised art events, dinners and nature expeditions that evoke connection and inspiration. And yes, they brought together the kind of people that inspire each other.

The idea behind Socrates is that there is nothing beyond experience. You can read, discuss and analyse... it doesn't strike your deepest self unless you experience it yourself. Socrates aimed to provide the kind of experiences that make life better and more beautiful.
profile_positions.title: Founder
